-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public.users
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    eposta character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    sifre character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."Job Seekers"
(
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    ad character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    soyad character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    "tcNo" character varying(11) NOT NULL,
    "dogumYili" date NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("userId")
);

CREATE TABLE public."Employeers"
(
    "userId" integer,
    "sirketAdi" character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    "webSite" character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    telefon character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("userId")
);

CREATE TABLE public."Employees"
(
    "userId" integer NOT NULL,
    conformation boolean NOT NULL,
    "departmentId" integer NOT NULL,
    ad character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    soyad character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("userId")
);

CREATE TABLE public."Deparment"
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    "deparmentAd" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public."jobPositions"
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    "jobAd" character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE public.users
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public."Job Seekers" ("userId")
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.users
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public."Employeers" ("userId")
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."Employeers"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Employees" ("userId")
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."Job Seekers"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("userId")
    REFERENCES public."Employees" ("userId")
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.users
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public."Employees" ("userId")
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."Employees"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("departmentId")
    REFERENCES public."Deparment" (id)
    NOT VALID;

END;
